meta.description: Standard Help>About module labels (plus a few additional labels)

languageKey.label: TYPO3 Professional Web Content Management System

TYPO3 is a flexible and professional Open Source Web-CMS based on PHP4 and MySQL.

TYPO3 is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).
